html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-07042021-07-01
ActTransportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada Act
PrecisReappointment of PATRICK VERMETTE of Kingston, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of two years; and his designation as Chairperson of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, effective September 2, 2021.
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada Act
precis: Reappointment of PATRICK VERMETTE of Kingston, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of two years; and his designation as Chairperson of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, effective September 2, 2021.
